# Aufgabe

Importieren Sie den Datensatz `mariokart` in R.
Berechnen Sie die Korrelation von Verkaufspreis (`total_pr`) und Startgebot (`start_pr`)!

Hinweise:

- Runden Sie auf 2 Dezimalstellen.



</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>

# Lösung

Pakete starten:


::: {.cell hash='mariokart-korr1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_805b9ddd258c6e9af291f9b9bd211eed'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(easystats)
```
:::



Daten importieren:


::: {.cell hash='mariokart-korr1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_9d83bd2d19df1077ee57bfb93bf5c0da'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d_url <- "https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/openintro/mariokart.csv"
d <- data_read(d_url)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='mariokart-korr1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_a68224c50761ea6d3b7c9dd419a7ad1b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
solution <- 
d  %>% 
  summarise(pr_cor = cor(total_pr, start_pr))
solution
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
      pr_cor
1 0.07340603
```
:::
:::



Alternativ kann man (komfortabel) die Korrelation z.B. so berechnen:


::: {.cell hash='mariokart-korr1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_9647a6e02cca2ae3629dec07814fb347'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d %>% 
  select(start_pr, total_pr) %>% 
  correlation()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# Correlation Matrix (pearson-method)

Parameter1 | Parameter2 |    r |        95% CI | t(141) |     p
---------------------------------------------------------------
start_pr   |   total_pr | 0.07 | [-0.09, 0.23] |   0.87 | 0.384

p-value adjustment method: Holm (1979)
Observations: 143
```
:::
:::



Man kann das Ergebnis von `correlation` auch einfach in ein Diagramm überführen:


::: {.cell hash='mariokart-korr1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_10f19c7ffae42cd83986ec0c6a8085a7'}

```{.r .cell-code}
mariokart_corr1 <- 
d %>% 
  select(start_pr, total_pr) %>% 
  correlation()

mariokart_corr1 %>% plot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){fig-pos='H' width=384}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='mariokart-korr1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_9fec0d648ff14f42b4f79e0ccb85dd4a'}

:::


**Lösung:** 0.07.
